title: Personal data schema
description: Schema for the Mee personal data store

ContextID.description: A unique identifier of a context. An example would be a website URL. E.g. 'amazon.com'
ContextID.comment: need to type this more strongly than a string

AppID.description: A unique indentifier for a mobile, desktop or webapp app that is used to access the context. E.g. 'Mobile-Safari'
AppID.comment: need to type this more strongly than a string

AppHelperID.description: A unique identifier for an optional 'helper' add-on, plug-in, service. e.g. Password manager service registered to Mobile Safari
AppHelperID.comment: need to type this more strongly than a string

UserID.description: A unique identifier for the user within this context. E.g. 'ptrevithick@gmail.com'
